#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long a,b,tempa,tempb,add=0,ans=0;

    while(1)
    {
        cin >> a >>b;
        if(a==0 && b==0)
            break;
        ans=0;
        while(a || b)
        {
            tempa=a%10;
            a=a/10;
            tempb=b%10;
            b=b/10;
            add+=(tempa+tempb);
            if(add>9)
            {
                ans++;
                add=1;
            }
            else
                add=0;
        }
        if(ans==0)
            cout<< "No carry operation.\n";
        else if(ans==1)
            cout << "1 carry operation.\n";
        else
            cout<<ans<<" carry operations.\n";

    }

    return 0;
}
